original: intros. intros Hy Hf. split. - destruct Hf as [Hlin Hd]. split. + apply Hlin. + intros x Hlim. specialize (Hd x Hlim). unfold is_domin in Hd. unfold is_domin. intros P HP. apply (filter_imp (fun y => minus y x) (fun y => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))). * intros y Hy'. unfold minus. rewrite opp_plus. rewrite opp_plus. repeat rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite (plus_comm (- f x)). rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite (plus_comm (- l x)). apply Hp. * apply Hd. apply is_filter_lim_shift. apply HP. - intros x Hlim. apply Hy. apply Hf. apply Hlim.
